alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 2:58AM MST until December 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches, with locally higher amounts possible on the higher peaks. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West, Wind River Mountains East, Salt River and Wyoming Ranges and Upper Green River Basin Foothills. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel over passes could be difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
